name: JWT Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 JWT Tool 节点。主要用于: JWT

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: JWT | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: sign

useJson.name: useJson
useJson.description: Whether to use JSON to build the claims
useJson.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use JSON to Build Payload | 作用: Whether to use JSON to build the claims | 默认值: False

claims.name: claims
claims.natural_language_description: 参数名: Payload Claims | 默认值: {}
available_options: audience (值: None) - Identifies the recipients that the JWT is intended for
expiresIn (值: None) - The lifetime of the token in seconds
issuer (值: None) - Identifies the principal that issued the JWT
jwtid (值: None) - Unique identifier for the JWT
notBefore (值: None) - The time before which the JWT must not be accepted for processing
subject (值: None) - Identifies the principal that is the subject of the JWT

claimsJson.name: claimsJson
claimsJson.description: Claims to add to the token in JSON format

token.name: token
token.description: The token to verify or decode
token.natural_language_description: 参数名: Token | 作用: The token to verify or decode | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: complete (值: None) - Whether to return the complete decoded token with information about the header and signature or just the payload
ignoreExpiration (值: None) - Whether to ignore the expiration of the token
ignoreNotBefore (值: None) - Whether to ignore the not before claim of the token
clockTolerance (值: None) - Number of seconds to tolerate when checking the nbf and exp claims, to deal with small clock differences among different servers
kid (值: None) - The kid (key ID) claim is an optional header claim, used to specify the key for validating the signature
algorithm (值: None) - The algorithm to use for signing or verifying the token, overrides algorithm in credentials
